author: Bradley Crisp
text: We are attempting to create a social media use policy (for both on- and off-duty personnel) and I am looking for anyone who has a current policy.  Specifically, I am looking for policies which pertain to social media personal sites, where someone identifies themselves as a firefighter/police officer/city employee, and then posts things, such as pictures or content, which would typically be viewed as innapropriate.  Any help would be greatly appriciated.
title: Social Media Use Policy
